title: Fix 'Not Found' routing error on deployed app

requirements.text: Fix the 'Not Found' error displayed when navigating to the deployed application. Ensure the TanStack Router configuration correctly handles the root route and all defined routes (home, about, event-details, registration, gallery, check-registration, admin, admin/dashboard) so that users land on the home page by default without seeing a 404/not-found screen.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigating to the root URL '/' renders the HomePage without any 'Not Found' error
All defined routes (about, event-details, registration, gallery, check-registration, admin, admin/dashboard) resolve correctly
A proper catch-all or fallback route is defined so unknown paths show a user-friendly 404 page rather than a blank or broken screen
The deployed production build does not show 'Not Found' on initial page load

requirements.text: Ensure the frontend build configuration (index.html and asset paths) supports client-side routing correctly in the Internet Computer deployment environment, so that deep-link navigation and page refreshes do not result in 'Not Found' errors.
acceptanceCriteria: Page refresh on any valid route does not produce a 'Not Found' error
Direct URL navigation to any defined route loads the correct page

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Do not alter the existing backend actor or data models
